Title: Rounded Corners / DIV Container
Description: The RoundedDiv round corners container is a skin-able, CSS compliant UI control.  Select which corners should be rounded, collapse and expand the contents or use "Ctrl+Click" to collapse or expand ALL round containers on a page.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The RoundedDiv round corners container is a skin-able, CSS compliant UI control. Select which corners should be rounded, collapse and expand the contents or use "Ctrl+Click" to collapse or expand ALL round containers on a page.



<Technullogy:RoundedDiv 
                runat="server" 
                ID="RoundedDiv1"
                CustomSkin=""
                EmbeddedSkin="Slate"
                EnableCollapsibleContent="true"
                EnableEmbeddedSkins="true"
                RoundBottomLeft="true"
                RoundBottomRight="true"
                RoundTopLeft="true"    
                RoundTopRight="true"
                Title="Technullogy Round Corners"
                TitleImageUrl="~/Images/shinyOrb.png" />
